tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE audio_samples (
    sample_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sample_name VARCHAR(255),
    sample_length INT,
    sample_data BYTEA
)

CREATE TABLE audio_samples (
	audio_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	name VARCHAR(255),
	artist VARCHAR(255),
	duration INT,
	genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE compositions (
	composition_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	title VARCHAR(255),
	artist VARCHAR(255),
	date_created DATE,
	length INT
);

CREATE TABLE users (
	user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	username VARCHAR(50),
	email VARCHAR(100),
	country VARCHAR(50),
	date_joined DATE
);

CREATE TABLE favorites (
	favorite_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	user_id INT,
	audio_id INT,
	composition_id INT,
	FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (audio_id) REFERENCES audio_samples(audio_id),
	FOREIGN KEY (composition_id) REFERENCES compositions(composition_id)
);

CREATE TABLE sample_ratings (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  sample_id INT,
  rating INT,
  rated_by VARCHAR(100),
  rated_on TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (sample_id) REFERENCES audio_samples(id)
);

CREATE TABLE composition_audio (
  id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  composition_id INT,
  audio_sample_id INT,
  added_on TIMESTAMP NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  FOREIGN KEY (composition_id) REFERENCES compositions(id),
  FOREIGN KEY (audio_sample_id) REFERENCES audio_samples(id)
);
